attributes.action: The levels of service of the xbox live 360 network is not what we are contracted into
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is to raise awareness that the xbox 360 live network is not performing as contracted by Microsoft and therfore its users are feeling a little disheartened by the service given or rather the lack of service

This petition relates to downtime as the main problem but other problems include

Problem patches
slow network speeds
unfair terms and conditions
payment of service before service has been completed - levels of services apply

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
